title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions:
The student response includes none of these criteria.

  • Absolute minimum output value with label

  • Absolute maximum output value with label

  • Both the absolute minimum output value and the absolute maximum output value, without labels

  • Input values for both the absolute minimum output value and the absolute maximum output value, with or without labels

The student response includes one of these criteria.

  • Absolute minimum output value with label

  • Absolute maximum output value with label

  • Both the absolute minimum output value and the absolute maximum output value, without labels

  • Input values for both the absolute minimum output value and the absolute maximum output value, with or without labels

The student response includes both of these criteria.

  • Absolute minimum output value with label

  • Absolute maximum output value with label
